name: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
what_did:
Mozart started writing music when he was just 5 years old.
He played concerts for kings and queens across Europe.
He wrote over 600 pieces of music, including symphonies, operas, and songs.
why_matters:
Mozart changed the world of music with his amazing talent.
His music is still played and loved today, hundreds of years later.
He showed how creativity can shine at any age.

questions.q: How old was Mozart when he started writing music?
Who listened to Mozart play music?
How many pieces of music did he write?

fun_fact: Mozart once wrote a song called 'A Musical Joke' to make people laugh!
